TestCase.name: testDDLTableScan
TestCase.Resource: LogicalProject(ts=[$0], a=[$1], b=[$2]) +- LogicalFilter(condition=[>($1, 1)]) +- LogicalTableScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_database, src, source: [CollectionTableSource(ts, a, b)]]])
Calc(select=[ts, a, b], where=[>(a, 1)]) +- TableSourceScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_database, src, source: [CollectionTableSource(ts, a, b)]]], fields=[ts, a, b])

TestCase.name: testTableSourceScan
TestCase.Resource: LogicalProject(a=[$0], b=[$1], c=[$2]) +- LogicalTableScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_database, MyTable, source: [TestTableSource(a, b, c)]]])
TableSourceScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_database, MyTable, source: [TestTableSource(a, b, c)]]], fields=[a, b, c])

TestCase.name: testDDLWithComputedColumn
TestCase.Resource: LogicalProject(a=[$0], b=[$1], c=[+($0, 1)], d=[TO_TIMESTAMP($1)], e=[my_udf($0)]) +- LogicalTableScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_database, t1, source: [CollectionTableSource(a, b)]]])
Calc(select=[a, b, +(a, 1) AS c, TO_TIMESTAMP(b) AS d, my_udf(a) AS e]) +- TableSourceScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_database, t1, source: [CollectionTableSource(a, b)]]], fields=[a, b])
